lesson_1.topic: Gradient text requires webkit prefix for React
lesson_1.solution: Keep both webkit and standard properties for compatibility

lesson_2.topic: useEffect cleanup prevents memory leaks with intervals
lesson_2.detail: Must return cleanup function that calls clearInterval

lesson_3.topic: TypeScript interfaces make API integration bulletproof
lesson_3.detail: Full type safety from API ‚Üí component prevents runtime errors
lesson_3.benefit: Caught several bugs during development with TypeScript errors

lesson_4.topic: Metallic theme CSS variables work perfectly in React
lesson_4.detail: All var(--accent-blue) etc work identically in React CSS
lesson_4.benefit: Consistent look with zero effort, just import variables

lesson_5.topic: Simple routing is better than over-engineering
lesson_5.detail: Page state + switch statement beats React Router for simple dashboards
lesson_5.benefit: Zero dependencies, instant navigation, easy to understand
